verses.verse: The <S%H2130>Ziphites<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1732>"Doesn't<s%> David <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3452>desert?<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph,<s%> having <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H1245>him,<s%> to seek <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3452>desert,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%> But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> therefore sent <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H7270>spies,<s%> and <S%H3045>understood<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H3559>certainly<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H2583>encamped;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7901>lay,<s%> and <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> within the <S%H4570>place<s%> of the <S%H5971>wagons,<s%> and the people were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> around <S%H5439>him.<s%>

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and to <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Who will go <S%H3381>down<s%> with me to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp?<s%>" <S%H52>Abishai<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will go down with <S%H3381>you.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H52>Abishai<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> <S%H7586>and,<s%> behold, Saul <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H3463>sleeping<s%> within the <S%H4570>place<s%> of the <S%H2595>wagons,<s%> with his spear <S%H4600>stuck<s%> in the <S%H776>ground<s%> at his <S%H4763>head;<s%> and <S%H74>Abner<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> around <S%H5439>him.<s%>

Then <S%H52>Abishai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H5462>delivered<s%> up your <S%H341>enemy<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%> Now therefore please let me <S%H5221>strike<s%> him with the <S%H2595>spear<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> at one <S%H6471>stroke,<s%> and I will not strike him the second <S%H8138>time.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H52>Abishai,<s%> <S%H7843>"Don't<s%> destroy <S%H7971>him;<s%> for who can put forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> and be <S%H5352>guiltless?<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5062>strike<s%> <S%H3117>him;<s%> or his day shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4191>die;<s%> or he shall <S%H935>go<s%> down into <S%H4421>battle<s%> and <S%H5595>perish.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should put <S%H7971>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed;<s%> but now please <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> that is at his <S%H4763>head,<s%> and the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H7226>head;<s%> and they went <S%H3212>away:<s%> and no man <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3045>it,<s%> nor knew <S%H6974>it,<s%> neither did any awake; for they were all <S%H3463>asleep,<s%> because a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was fallen on <S%H5307>them.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> to the other <S%H5676>side,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> afar <S%H7350>off;<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> space being between <S%H4725>them;<s%>

and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6030>"Don't<s%> you answer, <S%H74>Abner?<s%>" Then <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"Who<s%> are you who <S%H7121>cries<s%> to the <S%H4428>king?<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H74>Abner,<s%> <S%H376>"Aren't<s%> you a man? Who is like you in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Why then have you not <S%H8104>kept<s%> watch over your <S%H113>lord,<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%> For <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> your <S%H113>lord.<s%>

This <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H2896>isn't<s%> good that you have <S%H6213>done.<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> you are <S%H1121>worthy<s%> to <S%H4194>die,<s%> because you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> watch over your <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> Now <S%H7200>see<s%> where the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H6835>is,<s%> and the jar of <S%H4325>water<s%> that was at his <S%H4763>head.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5234>knew<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is this your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David?<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why does my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H5650>servant?<s%> For what have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> Or what <S%H7451>evil<s%> is in my <S%H3027>hand?<s%>

Now <S%H113>therefore,<s%> please let my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant.<s%> If it is so that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has stirred you <S%H5496>up<s%> against <S%H7306>me,<s%> let him accept an <S%H4503>offering.<s%> But if it is the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> they are <S%H779>cursed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for they have <S%H1644>driven<s%> me out this <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5596>shouldn't<s%> cling to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Go, <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods!<s%>'

Now <S%H1818>therefore,<s%> don't let my blood <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> away from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H6550>flea,<s%> as when one <S%H7291>hunts<s%> a <S%H7124>partridge<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%> <S%H7725>Return,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> for I will no more do you <S%H7489>harm,<s%> because my <S%H5315>life<s%> was <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H5528>Behold,<s%> I have played the fool, and have <S%H7686>erred<s%> <S%H7235>exceedingly.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"Behold<s%> the <S%H2595>spear,<s%> O <S%H4428>king!<s%> Then let <S%H259>one<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men<s%> come <S%H5674>over<s%> and get <S%H3947>it.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7725>render<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and his <S%H530>faithfulness;<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> you into my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> and I <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

<S%H5315>Behold,<s%> as your life was <S%H1431>respected<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> so let my <S%H5315>life<s%> be <S%H1431>respected<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and let him <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of all <S%H6869>oppression.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You are <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%> You shall both <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6213>mightily,<s%> and shall <S%H3201>surely<s%> <S%H3201>prevail.<s%>" So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
